snippet.title: Sheep Stack | Gameplay Trailer iOS / Android
snippet.description:
Sheep Stack is out now, download it here for $2,99!:
https://itunes.apple.com/ca/app/sheep-stack/id915858167?mt=8&uo=4&at=1l3vmto

Subscribe us for latest and best iOS gameplay videos, trailers and walkthroughs
http://www.youtube.com/user/IGVGameplayreviews

A new official Shaun the Sheep game from Aardman Animations.

Ever wondered what it would be like to fling a sheep out of a HUGE pair of underpants? Of course you have!

Sheep Stack is the new game from Shaun the Sheep, where flying by the seat of your pants has never been so much fun! Using a pair of massive pants, launch Shaun’s flock into the sky and stack ‘em high to help them reach a plate of doughnuts waiting at the top. But watch out – the slightest wobble and your woolly wonder will crash to the ground!

Complete 60 challenging levels
Explore 60 levels across two fun-filled environments, facing obstacles and challenges designed to make your sheep tower topple! Dodge precarious platforms, swinging see-saws, tumbling tyres and whizzing water-wheels as you battle to keep your sheep upright. 

Master the art of sheep flinging
Become a flock-flinging phenomenon as you launch your sheep from their pants using simple controls that are quick to pick up but tricky to truly master. Work through the levels and develop your target hitting and balancing skills – the challenges get harder as you journey through the game!

Combine speed with skill to win rewards
The aim of the game is to reach the doughnuts with as few sheep as possible, in the quickest time possible – are you up for the Sheep Stack challenge?
